entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
